title: Update category tag styling to match live tags

requirements.text: Convert all category text labels to lowercase display throughout the UI, including category badges in the lobby and chatroom cards
acceptanceCriteria: All category labels display in lowercase
Category text transformation is consistent across lobby and chatroom views

requirements.text: Match the padding, font size, and visual styling of category tags to the existing 'LIVE' indicator badges in the lobby and chatroom cards

quotes: make the category tags the same size as the live tags (padding, etc.)

acceptanceCriteria: Category tags have identical padding to LIVE tags
Category tags have identical font size to LIVE tags
Category tags maintain visual consistency with LIVE tags in terms of height and border radius

constraints: Only modify category tag styling, do not change LIVE tag appearance
Maintain existing category functionality and behavior
nonGoals: Changing category names or adding new categories
Altering other UI elements beyond category tags
